title: $AVGO Broadcom Inc Q1 2025 Earnings Conference Call

rawLines.text: welcome to the Broadcom Inc.'s first
quarter fiscal year 2025 financial
results conference call at this time for
opening remarks and introductions I
would like to turn the call over to GU
head of investor relations of Broadcom
Inc
thank you Sheree and good afternoon
everyone joining me on today's call are
Hawktan president and CEO Kirstston
Spears chief financial officer and
Charlie Kawaz president Semiconductor
Solutions Group broadcom distributed a

if you did not receive a copy you may

comments made during today's call will

over to Hawk
thank you G and thank you everyone for
joining
today in our fiscal

with larger

so even as we have three hypers scale

in summary for Q2 we expect total

to
approximately

yearonear gross margin for our

approximately
68% up 70 basis points yearon year

increased 3% year-onear to 890 million
on increased investment in R&D for

now moving on to infrastructure software
revenue for infrastructure software of

commercial paper and cash on hand
reducing debt by a net 1.1
billion following these actions the

billion in floating rate debt is 5.4%

4.6% turning to capital allocation in Q1

4.95 billion shares now moving on to

with semiconductor revenue of

yearonear we expect Q2 AI revenue of 4.4
4 billion up 44%
year-onear for nonAI semiconductors we

Q2 infrastructure software revenue of
approximately 6.5 billion up 23%
yearonear we expect Q2 adjusted IBIDA to
be about 66%
for modeling purposes we expect Q2
consolidated gross margin to be down
approximately 20 basis points
sequentially on the revenue mix of
infrastructure software and product mix
within semiconductors as Hawk discussed
earlier we are increasing our R&D
investment in leading edge AI in Q2 and
accordingly we expect adjusted evad to
be approximately 66%
we expect the non-GAAP tax rate for Q2
and fiscal year 2025 to be approximately
14% that concludes my prepared remarks
